description: Smoky tempeh bacon, fresh tomatoes, lettuce, vegan garlic mayo, and creamy avocado on toasted bread - this is a vegan BLT made in heaven!
name: Avocado TLT - The Best Vegan BLT!
recipeIngredient: 8 slices rye bread (or other bread of choice)
1 head romaine lettuce (or a few big handfuls of baby romaine)
1/2 cup cashew mayo (or other vegan mayo)

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare the tempeh bacon according to the recipe, if not already prepared. Also, prepare the garlic mayo by mixing together the mayo and garlic.

Lightly toast the bread slices if desired. For each sandwich, spread about 1 tablespoon of the garlic mayo on each slice of bread. Layer with avocado, tomato slices, lettuce, and several slices of tempeh. Enjoy!
